attributes.action: Make all forms of geo-engineering affecting the environment illegal
attributes.additional_details:
The government has said geo-engineering is essential to meet its climate targets:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/geo-engineering-research-the-government-s-view/9d532e11-2980-4336-abdf-e1ef7f669949#why-they-are-needed

We want geo-engineering to be banned.
attributes.background:
We believe that neither the government, nor anyone else, should be able to use technologies to intervene in the Earth's natural systems. 
We want all forms of geo-engineering on land, sea and air to be banned.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
